website_summaries.verdict: These balls were developed as  therapy balls to help increase hand strength and mobility.
pros: Helps avoid scar tissue build up from injury or surgery
Exercises your hands, but not so stiff it will make you end up in pain
cons: Some users feel like the ball is too slick

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me. Overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I did not notice the size of the ball (2.36" = 6 cm). I expected the size being close to tennis balls. These are probably good for a child or a woman with small hands. I don't have big hands (my palms are less than 4"/10 cm wide), but for me these balls are way too small. Taking into account small size and small amount of material used, these two balls seem hugely overpriced. A fair price would be $4 for one ball, or $6 for two balls. I paid $15 for two balls.
customer_reviews.author: Tedka

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a simple way to strengthen my grip and hand strength. These balls are so,Poe but effective. No need for anything more complex. Additionally, Koh sends an email with a pdf with exercises and ways to use the Stress balls. Very nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schmeltekopf

customer_reviews.title: Best stress balls I've found -- great deal
customer_reviews.text: I love having two stress balls at once; cuts risk from losing one, and means you can do both hands at once (or just juggle idly). These balls look good, stand up well to a strong grip (I'm an adult male, slightly bigger and more muscular than average), and even bounce nicely off of walls if you want to do that while you think about something. They're not the stiffest stress balls I've experienced, but they strike the best balance of price, appearance, stiffness, and handfeel.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Gertler

customer_reviews.title: Helps Eliminate Pain After Surgery
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these!!️ I had trigger thumb surgery and needed something to knead in my hand to help heal and avoid scar tissue from building up after surgery. They are firm, yet gentle as to not over stimulate the nerves in my hand. Wish I would have known about these a couple of years ago when I had trigger finger surgery. It would have helped to lessen some painful recovery time💥 I use these and forgot that I’m massaging my hand after a while because they are so gentle.
customer_reviews.author: barb0710

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these stress balls because my doctor said I needed to find something to exercise my hands due to arthritis and some tendon problems. These balls are very good quality and I am very glad to have the booklet download with exercises shown. This was a great help for me.
customer_reviews.author: Blueiris63

customer_reviews.title: My coworkers and I are not using this product as ...
customer_reviews.text: My coworkers and I are not using this product as intended. Instead, we are throwing it around playing catch at work on our down times. However, if used as a stress ball, it works well too. The branding got scuffed off rather quickly though, I am assuming its due to my coworkers throwing it around so much.
customer_reviews.author: Nga

customer_reviews.title: good squeeze
customer_reviews.text: These balls are covered with a tough, synthetic fabric of some kind with a nice feel and, to my taste, just the right amount of firmness. I have medium-large hands and they are a good size, not too small. I have had the same ball, different branding, for several months and the stitching has held up so far although they will stain a bit if they get liquid on them which I consider a good sign of how much I use them. Recommended if the idea of a stress ball appeals to you at all...
customer_reviews.author: Recursive

customer_reviews.title: I love the soft velvety feel of the balls
customer_reviews.text: I love the soft velvety feel of the balls. It makes you want to squeeze and squeeze which is why you buy these right. They were great to have on a plane trip and on vacation. Good to use while watching TV. Great for rehab fingers, thumbs, wrists and forearms.
customer_reviews.author: JAG 808

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hand Exercise
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the dual ball set and they are pretty cool. We use them by alternating hand squeezes, which gets a great rhythm going. The texture and size of the balls make this very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: George Phelan

customer_reviews.title: Too soft for me, and pricey
customer_reviews.text: I feel that it is too soft and does not offer enough resistance. After receiving the product, I also think it is a bit pricey for what you get. I guess the softness is a thing of preference. I will keep them, but would not probably buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie James Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...ALMOST.
customer_reviews.text: Selected this product because it included 2 ebooks with exercise instructions; the balls seem of good quality, fells like gel or soft silicon. About the 2 free ebooks... WHERE ARE THEY?
customer_reviews.author: Alf

customer_reviews.title: Good product but no instructions
customer_reviews.text: I anxiously awaited delivery of the Koh Hand Exercising Balls which were delivered on time, but I am at a loss on how to use them and did not receive any instructions nor can I download them online or find them on YouTube. Very cryptic pdf links. If anyone can tell me how to get instructions I would appreciate it. Otherwise I cannot recommend a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adnilj

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these balls for my arthritic issues, carpal tunnel, and strengthening exercises. So far they are working well and seem to be sturdy enough to last for a while. Would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Anamariesobe

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Great stocking stuffer. An online instruction book is included with purchase. Great construction, comfortable, and conforms to any hand size. I highly recommend this product. I contacted the seller because inadvertently deleted the ebook. Immediately, I received an email with the attachment. Excellent Service!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jmda

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. She types a lot at work, so she now can exercise her hands. One at work and one at home. She loves them. These appear to be of great quality and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: NoBS

customer_reviews.title: Best on Market
customer_reviews.text: Koh Fit Stress Balls are really great for hand strengthening after carpel tunnel surgery. Thet even email 2 different brochures with exercises for stress and therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Works great and lasts
customer_reviews.text: I use these every night as I watch television to strengthen my hands and keep them limber. Great quality that lasts. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J. J.

customer_reviews.title: Really well made!
customer_reviews.text: This koh fit stress ball is feels like it was made from good material. I use it when I feel stressed out or just need to focus on something, it does the job. It also bounces well, too. I use it in my dorm when I’m bored. Really good product!
customer_reviews.author: Johan

customer_reviews.title: Great for tired hands
customer_reviews.text: Great stress balls. Very well-made. Needed due to amount of hours working on the computer. The seller is conscientious reaching out to make sure I was happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rizenshine

customer_reviews.title: Stress/Strength Ball
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be working well. Purchased for a 12 year old to help with hand injury. Filled with gel type. Smooth fabric outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and size
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a family member dealing with arthritis in their hands. They seem to be of good quality and resilient. The material on the outside is comfortable against the skin and the size is appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Momoffour

customer_reviews.title: Be knowledgeable of what muscle groups here trying to strengthen.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well-made product, just remember if you don't use it it's not going to work.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Karlek

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: We received our Koh Fit stress balls about two weeks ago.. My husband uses his to strengthen his hands. I use mine primarily to relieve stress. We both love them! His hands are already less painful and I now have a go-to item to relieve my daily little stressed. We are probably going to order another set so that we can have them in the car and in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Beezy

customer_reviews.title: Stress balls
customer_reviews.text: Well-made and feels good in hand. Unless you have pretty large hands, it may be a bit big. Seems fairly standard size. Maybe a quarter inch or 3/8 inch smaller might be better size. Stitching is good. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Capkirk50

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product to help me relieve stress and anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: Victor R.

customer_reviews.title: Stitching issue
customer_reviews.text: The product is great however the green ball stitching has began to unravel. The blue one is fine @ this time.
customer_reviews.author: TIna L.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Koh Fit stress balls for about a week now, and I have to say that they are great. They have a great feel, they are lightweight and colorful, plus I like the way that they fit in my hand. I would recommend these to anyone.....
customer_reviews.author: Terry Dybas

customer_reviews.title: Only received one
customer_reviews.text: Based on the title which indicates that this is a pack of TWO, I was very disappointed to only receive one stress ball. I hope we can fix this issue. if not, I will definitely be returning it as there is no way 1 stress ball is worth $18
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good package - 2 stress balls with online exercise book.
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have 2 in a package. Good quality, good tension. Larger size exercise balls, so very good with hand strengthening.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bogert

customer_reviews.title: Doctor recommended stress balls for problem I was having with hand
customer_reviews.text: Doctor recommended stress balls for problem I was having with hand. I thought it was arthritis,but he said I had a calcium buildup. Hope these balls solve problem.
customer_reviews.author: John Strength

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Not too soft and not too hard. Not too big, and not too small. True colors and made out of durable material. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits comfortably in the palm of your hand. It really helps exercise the hand especially if you have joint pain. It also helps with relaxation during stressful times. I would definitely recommend this product. They also make nice gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Nona Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Stress Ball
customer_reviews.text: I don't use stress balls to relieve stress, I just use them because I always have to be moving and this is a great way to do it. They are very high quality and they will last me for most likely the next 10 years or more. I highly recommend this product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Merrick

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Firm
customer_reviews.text: My Koh Fit stress balls are great. They squish well. They're silky smooth on the outside and firm on the inside. That is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: B. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: No Smell, nice size, squishy
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect, no odor, nice size, good resistance. very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: AZ2013

customer_reviews.title: Firm, Sturdy and Sleek
customer_reviews.text: I like the physical feel of this stress ball better than the gelatinous feel of most others. It sits well in the hand, and is quite firm, providing the right resistance. The included resources proved helpful as well. Very thoughtful.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Gray

customer_reviews.title: I like these.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My hands start to hurt and gently squeezing these really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Robertson

customer_reviews.title: High quality compared to some others
customer_reviews.text: Nice product fast delivery. High quality compared to some others!
customer_reviews.author: usual suspect 1

customer_reviews.title: ) Love this, bought to help my teenage son who ...
customer_reviews.text: :) Love this, bought to help my teenage son who is stressed over recently being diagnosed with Epilepsy. The stress ball has given him something to do with his hand and hopefully keep him calm. Awesome product and I love supporting small businesses like this who are working to help others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used to strengthen dislocated finger
customer_reviews.text: Got these to exercise my hands after dislocating a finger thanks to these my range of motion is slowly returning Thanks
customer_reviews.author: T. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Stress ball is very comfortable to hold and squeeze. Seller is easy to contact and responds quickly to questions and/or concerns. I am very pleased with my purchases (I purchased 4 of them!), and I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Ordering this product was easy and convenient it came right to my mailbox. I use these as part of my physical therapy to gain some strength in my hand
customer_reviews.author: Alice C.

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve stress while strengthening your grip.
customer_reviews.text: I do alot of data entry these stress balls are helping to strengthen my hands as well as relieve stress.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Barker

customer_reviews.title: great for strengthening grip
customer_reviews.text: The over on the ball doesn't get sticky, good exercise e book
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Messina

customer_reviews.title: Stress ball
customer_reviews.text: I just use mine for stress. Great quality. Fast delivery. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Sopko

customer_reviews.title: The customer service is great!
customer_reviews.text: The stress ball seems very durable and is a convenient size.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect feel
customer_reviews.text: These stress balls have just the right firmness with a smooth fabric cover.
customer_reviews.author: susan taylor

customer_reviews.title: You get 2 balls, for that good of a price.
customer_reviews.text: OMG! It’s like the best feeling ever in my hands. . I’m an older women and I do a lot of crafting, so I use my hands a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I did not receive the  instruction manual.  Disappointing to not receive what was promised
customer_reviews.text: Was planning on giving as a gift but no manual!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Wong

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The seam on the red ball began to tear within a few minutes of me using the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse and I use one for drawing blood and the other for when I'm stressed out. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Castor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No problems what so ever. Fast delivery. Gift for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Van Scyoc

customer_reviews.title: I did not want to move it at all and it appeared to be getting worse. After several months like this
customer_reviews.text: So I was having a serious problem with trigger finger and possibly arthritis in a joint. I did not want to move it at all and it appeared to be getting worse. After several months like this, my husband convinced me that exercising my hands and fingers to strengthen and get the blood moving was the best thing for them. So I ordered these fit balls and began with the recommended exercises and my fingers and hands feel so much better!!! I am very happy with them. I highly recommend. Good customer service as well! Keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: Mira W.

customer_reviews.title: Just the Right Size
customer_reviews.text: The Koh Fit ball feels just the right size in my hand. It also has just the right amount of resistance, and is pretty to look at. I am using it to mature my arteriovenous fistula for hemodialysis.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Most of these tension releasing, Exercise Balls are cheaply made and soon sand is coming out. However, these are tough, fit well in the hands, and take the pressure well. It eases the pain in my elbow, the pain in my hands, and I never have to worry about them breaking down. Outstanding Product.
customer_reviews.author: inspectorrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Multifunctional Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son as he tends to fidget a lot at school -- for that use, they've been great. As a bonus, they are also incredibly useful for juggling, bouncing off the walls, and throwing at his sister's head.
customer_reviews.author: vanagnos

product_meta.title: Koh Fit Stress Ball Multipacks - Stress Reliever Squeeze Balls - 2 Bonus Ebooks: Hand Therapy Exercise Guide + Stress Relief Guide
feature_bullets: PREMIUM - Unlike cheap stress balls, ours are smooth in hand & don't get sticky or smelly when used!
DEVELOP STRENGTH - Effective physical therapy & injury rehabilitation tool for hands and forearms.
MADE TO LAST - Premium quality, extra durable materials, soft gel core. 2.36" in diameter.
HAND EXERCISE GUIDE - 18-page ebook with exercises for grip strength, hand mobility and joint pain.
100% RISK-FREE PURCHASE - You’ll be secured by our 90 DAY money back satisfaction guarantee!
